Tenten throws five spiked iron balls at her opponent, then she unrolls her giant [[scroll]] and [[Unsealing Technique|summons]] a giant spiked iron ball connected by [[wire strings]] to her hand, which she slams onto her opponent.

== Trivia ==
* The giant iron ball summoned resembles the [[Jidanda]].
* Tenten also used this technique in ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]''.

[[es:Armas Manipuladas: Bola de Hierro Gigante]]
